lead_paragraph: Rich Nichols, the point person in the union’s negotiations with U.S. Soccer, was dismissed three days before its collective bargaining agreement was set to end.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Women’s Soccer Team Fires Union Leader
headline.main: U.S. Women’s National Team Fires Its Union’s Leader

snippet: Rich Nichols, the point person in the union’s negotiations with U.S. Soccer, was dismissed three days before its collective bargaining agreement was set to end....
abstract: United States women's national soccer team announces that they have dismissed their general counsel Rich Nichols three days before its collective bargaining agreement with US Soccer is scheduled to end; Nichols' departure could mean that current negotiations over pay could stretch into 2017.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
